title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: LMS Utilization Strategies for Developing Remote Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic online learning tools (Zoom, LMS) and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative learning sequences of three or more stages using an LMS (Learning Management System)
Learners can effectively manage collaborative tasks for groups of five or more by integrating real-time video conferencing tools with an LMS
Learners can create and share two or more types of interactive learning materials optimized for mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
